If the topologyConfigId has been change, it will overrule the processStandbyChange. processStandbyChange only is called when the topologyConfigId doesn't change and the list of standbys have been changed.
Is the logic correct that processStandbyChange called before updating the localTopology?

Can we also add a check of the log replication metadata at the standby side. It should indicate a status of snapshot full sync has finished and the timestamp for the snapshot full sync should agree with the current active log tail.
